line.comment: * disengage target if they leave scanner range
* $ret = [THIS]-> follow object $victim with precision $followdist m : timeout=$TIMEOUT.IS ms
* $ret = [THIS]-> follow object $victim with precision $followdist m : timeout=$TIMEOUT.OOS ms
* $ret = [THIS]-> defensive move: type=null, intensity=98, timeout=25000 ms, avoid object=$victim
* = [THIS]-> defensive move: type=null, intensity=98, timeout=30000 ms, avoid object=$victim
* fire missile even if we don't fire the main guns?
* (Cycrow) Check for shields if only targetting shields
* $Drones = find ship: sector=[SECTOR] class or type=[Fighter Drone] race=[OWNER] flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=[THIS] maxdist=10000 maxnum=123 refpos=null
* 8. added shields check to missile firing
* 13. added "get best missile array" to ease performance

fire missile even if we don't fire the main guns?

$Drones = find ship: sector=[SECTOR] class or type=[Fighter Drone] race=[OWNER] flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=[THIS] maxdist=10000 maxnum=123 refpos=null
